values.description: Force disable a pipeline, connection, or flow.

ApiFlowOptions.description: Properties specific to API Flow Type

remoteEndpoint.description: Remote host to which communication needs to be made

cname.description: Unique CNAME to represent the Azure Data Transfer API Flow instance

apiMode.description: Remote Calling Mode in the Azure Data Transfer API Flow, which describes how the API Flow will be invoked

identityTranslation.description: Flag for if Azure Data Transfer API Flow should extract the user token

senderClientId.description: Sender's app user assigned Manage Identity client ID

remoteCallingModeClientId.description: Remote stub app registration Client ID

audienceOverride.description: Optional field to override the audience of the remote endpoint

ApiMode.description: Remote Calling Mode in the Azure Data Transfer API Flow, which describes how the API Flow will be invoked

values.name: SDK
values.description: The API flow will forward calls to a custom Software Development Kit implementation.

values.name: Endpoint
values.description: The API flow will forward calls to a specified endpoint.

body.description: The body type of the operation request or response.

value.description: The Connection items on this page

nextLink.description: The link to the next page of items

pipeline.description: Pipeline to use to transfer data

forceDisabledStatus.description: Force disablement status of the current connection

linkStatus.description: Link status of the current connection

linkedConnectionId.description: Resource ID of the linked connection

flowTypes.description: The flow types being requested for this connection

remoteSubscriptionId.description: Subscription ID to link cloud subscriptions together

dateSubmitted.description: The timestamp that this connection request was submitted at

primaryContact.description: The primary contact for this connection request

secondaryContacts.description: The secondary contacts for this connection request

schemaUris.description: The schema URIs for this connection

values.name: InReview
values.description: This connection has been created but is under review by the pipeline owner.

values.name: Approved
values.description: This connection has been approved by the pipeline owner and is ready for use.

values.name: Rejected
values.description: This connection has been rejected by the pipeline owner and cannot be used.

values.name: Accepted
values.description: Creation of the connection has been accepted.

identity.description: The managed service identities assigned to this resource.

values.name: Blob
values.description: The flow uses Azure Storage blobs to send or receive data.

values.name: Table
values.description: The flow uses Azure Storage tables to send or receive data.

values.name: Send
values.description: The direction is on the sending side of a pipeline, connection, or flow.

values.name: Receive
values.description: The direction is on the receiving side side of a pipeline, connection, or flow.

identity.description: The managed service identities assigned to this resource.

FlowBillingTier.description: Billing tier for this messaging flow.

values.name: BlobTransport
values.description: Billing tier for messaging processing that charges based on how much data is transferred.

values.name: Standard
values.description: Billing tier for standard messaging processing that charges based on having the messaging resource allocated.

values.name: Premium
values.description: Billing tier for premium messaging processing that charges based on having the messaging resource allocated.

FlowListResult.description: The response of a Flow list operation.

value.description: The Flow items on this page

nextLink.description: The link to the next page of items

connection.description: The connection associated with this flow

flowId.description: Dataflow GUID associated with this flow

keyVaultUri.description: URI to a Key Vault Secret containing a SAS token.

linkStatus.description: Link status of the current flow

linkedFlowId.description: Resource ID of the linked flow

forceDisabledStatus.description: Force disablement status of the current flow

flowType.description: The flow type for this flow

dataType.description: Type of data to transfer via the flow.

schema.description: The selected schema for this flow

messagingOptions.description: The messaging options for this flow

apiFlowOptions.description: The API Flow configuration options for Azure Data Transfer API Flow type.

customerManagedKeyVaultUri.description: The URI to the customer managed key for this flow

streamLatency.description: The latency of the stream in milliseconds

passphrase.description: The passphrase used for SRT streams

sourceAddresses.description: The source IP address and CIDR ranges of the stream

destinationEndpoints.description: The destination endpoints of the stream

destinationEndpointPorts.description: The destination endpoint ports of the stream

values.name: Enabled
values.description: The flow is currently enabled and able to send or receive data.

values.name: Disabled
values.description: The flow is currently disabled and cannot send or receive data.

FlowType.description: Flow type for the specified resource

values.name: Unknown
values.description: This type of flow is not set.

values.name: Complex
values.description: This flow sends complex documents, such as Microsoft Office documents of Portable document format files.

values.name: DevSecOps
values.description: This flow sends source code files and artifacts.

values.name: Messaging
values.description: This flow over the Azure Data Transfer low latency messaging subsystem.

values.name: Mission
values.description: This flow sends data that will not be processed by any security system.

values.name: MicrosoftInternal
values.description: This flow is assigned to internal Microsoft use cases.

values.name: BasicFiles
values.description: This flow sends blobs that can be used for multiple use cases.

values.name: Data
values.description: This flow sends blobs that can be used for multiple use cases.

values.name: Standard
values.description: This flow sends blobs that can be used for multiple use cases.

values.name: StreamingVideo
values.description: This flow sends video streams.

values.name: Opaque
values.description: This flow sends blobs that will not be processed by any security system.

values.name: MissionOpaqueXML
values.description: This flow sends Extensible Markup Language that will not be processed by any security system.

values.name: DiskImages
values.description: This flow sends blobs that can be used for Virtual Machines.

values.name: API
values.description: This flow sends data via an Application Programmer Interface.

identity.description: The managed service identities assigned to this resource.

values.name: ConnectionForceDisabled
values.description: This Flow has been disabled as the connection has been disabled.

values.name: FlowTypeForceDisabled
values.description: This Flow has been disabled as the flow type this flow uses has been disabled.

GetDestinationEndpointPortsResult.description: List of destination endpoint ports for the flow stream

ports.description: The destination endpoint port for the flow stream

GetDestinationEndpointsResult.description: List of destination endpoints for the flow stream

endpoints.description: The destination endpoints for the flow stream

GetStreamConnectionStringResult.description: The connection string for the specified streaming flow

connectionString.description: The connection string for the specified streaming flow

IdentityTranslation.description: Flag for if Azure Data Transfer API Flow should extract the user token

values.name: UserIdentity
values.description:
The API flow will make use of the user identity that called this API flow, and pass that token
through the boundary.

values.name: ServiceIdentity
values.description: The API flow will make use of the Azure Data Transfer Flow managed identity on the other side of the boundary.

LinkStatus.description: Link status of the current pipeline, connection, flow.

values.name: Linked
values.description:
The pipeline, connection, or flow is currently linked with another corresponding pipeline,
connection, or flow, and can be used.

values.name: Unlinked
values.description:
The pipeline, connection, or flow is not linked with another corresponding pipeline,
connection, or flow, and cannot be used.

ListApprovedSchemasRequest.description: The request used to list approved schemas within the resource provider.

pipeline.description: The name of the pipeline to filter approved schemas.

direction.description: The direction pipeline to filter approved schemas.

ListFlowsByPipelineConnection.description: A connection resource id in addition to all child flow resources under this connection.

flows.description: List of flows associated with the connection.

value.description: List flows by pipeline result by connection

MessagingOptions.description: The option associated with messaging flows.

billingTier.description: Billing tier for this messaging flow

OperationStatusEnum.description: Operation status for the last patch request for this connection.

values.name: Failed
values.description: The last patch request for this connection completed with an error.

values.name: Succeeded
values.description: The last patch request for this connection completed.

values.name: UDP
values.description: This Flow is using User Datagram Protocol for the video stream.

values.name: SRT
values.description: This Flow is using Secure Reliable Transfer for the video stream.

values.name: RTP
values.description: This Flow is using Real-time Transport Protocol for the video stream.
